abstract: A JPMorgan banker advising Access Industries is blamed for losing $98 million of the company’s money betting on risky subprime mortgage securities.
snippet: A JPMorgan banker advising Access Industries is blamed for losing $98 million of the company’s money betting on risky subprime mortgage securities.
lead_paragraph: Len Blavatnik, the Russian-American investor, plans to file a lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase on Monday that accuses the bank of mismanaging an investment account that held $1 billion in assets owned by his industrial holding company, Access Industries.

headline.main: Company Is Planning to Sue Chase Over Investment Losses
headline.print_headline: Company Is Planning to Sue Chase Over Investment Losses

headline.main: Investor to Sue JP Morgan Chase for Subprime Losses
